nonCompete.detailedExplanation: Delaware courts closely scrutinize non-competes. Must be necessary to protect legitimate business interest, reasonable in scope/time/geography. Employee must receive something of value beyond continued employment.
nonCompete.suggestion: Use narrowly tailored restrictions, 1 year maximum recommended
nonCompete.actionRequired: Ensure narrow scope and adequate consideration provided
nonCompete.alternativeLanguage: narrowly tailored confidentiality and non-solicitation provisions

salaryHistory.detailedExplanation: Employers cannot screen applicants based on wage history or require disclosure of wage history. Cannot seek wage history from current or former employers.
salaryHistory.alternativeLanguage: What are your salary expectations for this role?

backgroundChecks.message: Cannot inquire about criminal history on initial application
backgroundChecks.detailedExplanation: Employers with 4+ employees cannot ask about criminal convictions on initial employment application. Can inquire later in hiring process.
backgroundChecks.requirement: Remove criminal history questions from applications
backgroundChecks.actionRequired: Delay criminal history inquiry until after initial application

paidLeave.detailedExplanation: Employers with 10+ employees must provide paid sick leave. 1 hour per 30 hours worked, up to 40 hours per year.

finalPay.message: Final wages due next regular payday
